TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpressRouteCircuitResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing an ExpressRouteCircuit along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetExpressRouteCircuitResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetExpressRouteCircuit method.
